title: Bug 11314 - Replace package name fragments should always be smaller
description: The current behavior related to package name replacement fragments needs improvement.
OB: When attempting to replace package name fragments, the resulting replacement is larger than the original fragment.
EB: The replacement for package name fragments should always be smaller in size compared to the original fragment.
SR: Build 20020214: If you enter '2~.' as the package name fragment, the replacement is unexpectedly larger.
